user.title: SecuraCV Setup
user.description:
Configure your SecuraCV Privacy Witness Kernel integration.

Enter the MQTT topic prefix used by your Canary devices. The default is 'securacv' which subscribes to topics like securacv/{device_id}/events.

data_description.mqtt_prefix: The MQTT topic prefix your Canary devices publish to (default: securacv)

error.invalid_mqtt_prefix: Invalid MQTT topic prefix. Use only alphanumeric characters, underscores, and forward slashes.

abort.already_configured: This MQTT prefix is already configured.
